name: tail-glow
effect: Raises the user's Special Attack by three stages.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Flashes a light that sharply
raises SP. ATK.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Flashes a light that sharply
raises SP. ATK.

light that sharply
raises its SP. ATK
stat.

Sp. Atk stat.
